subject: New Toy---FM radio kit
author: urkel23@aol.com
full_text:
--part1_d312.21ee6670.3bfb1607_boundary

--part1_d312.21ee6670.3bfb1607_alt_boundary
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit


Found an FM radio kit at radio  shack today, got it for only $15. It's 
voltage tunable, so i should be able to  convert it to a ghost box. I just 
finished putting it together, will test it out  tomorrow. Came with a speaker and 
an amp section, i just have to add a new  volume knob; power switch; sweep 
knob and my circuit.
 
-Steve H.
 
 
 
Steve Hultay
_www.keyportparanormal.com_ (http://www.keyportparanormal.com/)
